body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling NoteWorthy, the premier music school for aspiring musicians. My name is Jose Green. May I know who I'm speaking with today?

Hi Jose, this is Sarah Campbell. I'm so excited to be starting classes soon!

Great to hear from you, Sarah! It's wonderful that you're excited. How can I assist you with your billing today?

I just wanted to confirm the tuition fee for the upcoming semester and make sure everything is squared away.

Absolutely, Sarah. Could you please provide your student ID number so I can look up your account?

Sure, my student ID is one two three four five six.

Thank you, Sarah. Now, can you confirm the last four digits of your phone number for account verification?

It's seven eight nine zero.

Perfect, thank you! I see that your tuition fee for the semester is one two zero zero dollars. You're all set for the upcoming classes. Everything looks good on your account.

That's great! Thank you so much, Jose. I'm looking forward to starting my classes.

You're very welcome, Sarah. It's my pleasure to help. Thank you for choosing NoteWorthy. Have a wonderful day and enjoy your classes!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Jose Green from NoteWorthy discusses billing with Sarah Campbell. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
